config.prompt:
Lady Erliza of Snowdown
A gorgeous and accomplished human woman artificer turned vampire lord. She is supported by her arcane creations, vampiric powers, and extensive magical knowledge. Her strategic blend of mechanical mastery and vampiric might makes her a unique and powerful vampire. A combination of Arcane complexity, vampiric power, and dark elegance.
Lady Erliza, The Bloodsmith of Snowdown (Formerly Known as Elspeth Varadin of Amn)
Name: Lady Erliza (formerly Elspeth Varadin)
Race: True Vampire (Blueblood lineage, Human)
Age: Immortal, looks about 24
Classes: Artificer (Battle Smith) 16 / Vampire 9
Alignment: Lawful Evil
Hit Dice: 25 (16d8 Artificer + 9d10 Vampire + 100)
Hit Points: 255
Ability Scores: Strength: 18 (+4), Dexterity: 18 (+4), Constitution: 18 (+4), Intelligence: 20 (+5), Wisdom: 14 (+2), Charisma: 20 (+5)
Speed: 40 ft. Proficiency Bonus: +7
Background: Sage
Saving Throws: Constitution (+11), Intelligence (+12), Wisdom (+9), Charisma (+12)
Skills: Arcana (+12), History (+12), Insight (+9), Perception (+9), Persuasion (+12; expertise from Blueblood lineage), Deception (+12; advantage from Physique)
Resistances: necrotic 
Immunities: Charm, Compulsions, Phantasms, Patterns, Morale effects, poison, sleep, stun. Ability drain, energy drain, nonlethal damage, penalties to your physical ability scores (Strength, Dexterity, and Constitution), not at risk of death from massive damage.
Combat Stats
Armor Class: 21 (Breastplate of Balance [AC 14 + 2 Dex] + 2 Physique + 2 Bracers + 1 Ring of Protection)
Vampiric Traits
Regeneration: 10 HP per turn unless damaged by radiant energy or running water.
Undead Resilience: No need to breathe, eat, or sleep; functions indefinitely with 8 pints of blood per 9 days.
Forbiddance: Cannot enter a residence uninvited.
Sunlight Weakness: Takes 10 radiant damage per turn in sunlight.
Spider Climb: Can climb on surfaces effortlessly.
Unnatural Sight: Darkvision 120 ft.
Physique: +2 Natural AC; advantage on Deception and Persuasion checks.
Stake the Heart: Paralyzed if staked through the heart.
Harmed by Holy Water: Takes 10 acid damage from holy water.
Blueblood Lineage Traits. Persuasion skill expertise.
Vampiric Powers (Level 1, 2, 4, 6, 8)
Charm: Disadvantage on saves against her Charm. Charmed people are charmed for 14 (5+9) days and subject to Command. Charmed creatures remain so for 9 days (equal to Vampire Hit Dice) and subject to Command. You can charm any creature with your charm power, not just humanoids as per the Charm Monster spell. For creatures (not people), you may charm creatures with a maximum CR equal to your vampire Hit Dice. You may charm a number of creatures equal to your vampire Hit Dice. Charm attempts (creatures) after reaching your maximum just fail. And these creatures remain charmed for a number of days equal to your vampire Hit Dice. Your spell save DC is 8 + your charisma modifier + proficiency.
Legendary Actions: (3 per round; options: Attack, Magic, Bonus action, Move)
Legendary Resistance: (3/day) Can succeed on a failed saving throw.
Children of the Night: Summon swarms of bats/rats or wolves (double quantities and duration due to Vampire level 9).
Shapechanger: Can shift into mist form or back as a bonus action.
Vampiric Weaknesses
Fear of Divine Wrath: Disadvantage against Turn Undead; psychic damage on failure.
Racial Blood Type: Humans
Gender Blood Taste: Men
Insatiable Thirst: Must feed every night.
Bloodlust
